snippet: For Lebanese content to stay out of the storm, and for Arab visitors seeking respite from fear and uncertainty around the region, Beirut is a destination to enjoy life.
abstract: Beirut, Lebanon, is recapturing the allure it once had as an international pleasure destination in the 1960s; city has become a welcome pocket of luxury, tolerance and nightlife for wealthy Lebanese and Arab visitors seeking respite from regional fear and uncertainty.
lead_paragraph: For Lebanese content to stay out of the storm, and for Arab visitors seeking respite from fear and uncertainty around the region, Beirut is a destination to enjoy life.
